elements.label: Auclair, an acquaintance
elements.description: Auclair has a scholarly aspect and a morbid streak. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Auclair, a believer
elements.description: Auclair is quiet, meticulous and remorseless.

elements.label: Auclair, a disciple
elements.description: Auclair rarely speaks. She chooses her words with care. Even her movements have become economical. She is never seen to blink.

elements.label: A gaunt woman, who is silent
elements.description: The air is frosty, the candles gutter, the street-sounds are hushed. Someone is here.

elements.label: Cat Caro, an acquaintance
elements.description: 'Cat Caro', as she styles herself, earns a living as a stage medium and a fortune-teller. She may have deeper talents. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Cat Caro, a believer
elements.description: A bright-eyed, watchful woman who recalls her dreams perfectly.

elements.label: Cat Caro, a disciple
elements.description: She still performs in the theatres sometimes. 'Cat Caro,' the posters say, 'finds the path; Cat Caro knows the way.'

elements.label: Cat Caro, a Seer
elements.description: Archaeologists find treasures in tombs. Farmers bring harvest from the fields. What does Cat Caro unearth in dreams?

elements.label: 'Pope' Clifton, an acquaintance
elements.description: A bellowing and unorthodox Catholic with a mystic streak and an untrimmed beard. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: 'Pope' Clifton, a believer
elements.description: Now Clifton improvises new prayers rich with solar metaphors. He still shouts like a soldier and drinks like a sailor.

elements.label: 'Pope' Clifton, a disciple
elements.description: Clifton's devotions have grown complex. His eyes have grown wide and shining. His voice has become even louder.

elements.label: Clifton, a Seer
elements.description: Clifton still recites his prayers, but they are grown strange as old mirrors. He rises every morning to greet the dawn. He looks it full in the face, and tells you exactly what he sees.

elements.label: Clovette, an acquaintance
elements.description: Clovette is happy in a way that brooks no counter-argument to happiness. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Clovette, a believer
elements.description: Clovette's determined happiness now borders on the fanatical.

elements.label: Clovette, a disciple
elements.description: Clovette's optimism is daunting. She wields her joy like a hammer.

elements.label: Clovette, a Tarantellist
elements.description: Clovette is always in motion. She laughs easily. Her smile is the crescent at the edge of the moon.

elements.label: Connie, a disciple
elements.description: Connie's found one last gambit she couldn't resist... or perhaps she's just enjoying life.

elements.label: Connie, a Conqueress
elements.description: It's not in Connie's nature to serve. One day she'll rise as a river rises. But for now, she stoops to conquer.

elements.label: Dorothy, an acquaintance
elements.description: Dorothy is an enthusiastic sort with an eclectic reading habit. She's fascinated by my hints about the shapes beneath the world's skin. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Dorothy, a believer
elements.description: Dorothy is an enthusiastic sort, and I have turned her enthusiasm to our advantage.

elements.label: Dorothy, a disciple
elements.description: Dorothy's enthusiasm has become obsession. She will not cease; and how she loves to dance.

elements.label: Dorothy, a Tarantellist
elements.description: When Dorothy moves, we hear the drum. When she speaks, we see the dance. Her determination is her shield and her weapon.

elements.label: Douglas, a believer
elements.description: Douglas has exchanged the Force for the Forge.

elements.label: Douglas, a disciple
elements.description: Douglas doesn't like hammers. They remind him of an Incident. But he uses what instruments he must.

elements.label: Douglas, a Reshaper
elements.description: Douglas has changed so much. His eyes glow like smithy windows in fog. His voice is the rattle of coal in the chute. His arm is long.

elements.label: Elridge, an acquaintance
elements.description: An elegant man of inelegant habits. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Elridge, a believer
elements.description: Elridge has almost learnt not to pick his teeth with his knife in conversation. He has not yet learnt to leave his knife in his boot.

elements.label: Elridge, a disciple
elements.description: Elridge is waiting patiently until it's time to knife someone again.

elements.label: Elridge, an Assassin
elements.description: Elridge is never seen with a spot of blood upon his person. Not a spot.

elements.label: Enid, an acquaintance
elements.description: Enid speaks softly, and sometimes her gaze doesn't focus on anything visible. It may be that you've dreamed the same dreams. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Enid, a believer
elements.description: Enid speaks softly, and sometimes her gaze doesn't focus on anything visible. She sees things that others don't.

elements.label: Enid, a disciple
elements.description: Enid sees what others do not. It is becoming difficult for her, but it is very useful.

elements.label: Enid, a Key
elements.description: Enid sees the gaps between things, and the arts that she has learned permit her, sometimes, to place her fingers in that gap.

elements.label: Laidlaw, an acquaintance
elements.description: Laidlaw is a tinkerer and mechanic with an uncanny knack. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Laidlaw, a believer
elements.description: Laidlaw has begun to understand the limitations of ingenuity, and the power of sacrifice.

elements.label: Laidlaw, a disciple
elements.description: Laidlaw has learnt the cleverer uses of fire and copper, wax and acid.

elements.label: Laidlaw, a Reshaper
elements.description: Laidlaw can shape what is broken into what is necessary.

elements.label: Leo, an acquaintance
elements.description: Leo is an earnest sort with an interest in the occult. He hangs on your hints about the invisible arts. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Leo, a believer
elements.description: Leo is an earnest sort, but he's prepared to do what he must.

elements.label: Leo, a disciple
elements.description: Leo still yearns to preserve what is good and valuable; but he understands that to protect one's ideals, one must sometimes do questionable things.

elements.label: Leo, a Tarantellist
elements.description: Leo will preserve, at all costs. He will not cease.

elements.label: Natalia, a disciple
elements.description: Natalia never follows unquestioningly - but for now, she follows.

elements.label: Natalia, a Sage
elements.description: Natalia has aligned herself with the brightest path she can find.

elements.label: Neville, an acquaintance
elements.description: Neville pauses before he speaks, and flinches easily. He laughs whenever he thinks you've made a joke. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Neville, a believer
elements.description: Neville pauses before he speaks, and flinches easily. He's sensitive to deeper matters.

elements.label: Neville, a disciple
elements.description: Neville's gaze has grown furtive, and his voice is sometimes shrill. He speaks freely of his dreams.

elements.label: Neville, a Key
elements.description: In his dreams, Neville sees the flaws where the world and its ways can be opened.

elements.label: Porter, an acquaintance
elements.description: Porter was a barber, until the court case. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Porter, a believer
elements.description: Porter plies his razor and his scissors, to the great advantage of his friends.

elements.label: Porter, a disciple
elements.description: Porter goes unnoticed, until he's ready.

elements.label: Porter, a Skintwister
elements.description: Porter, like a spider, is found in the most unexpected places.

elements.label: Renira, an acquaintance
elements.description: Renira has been found not guilty three times in three separate jurisdictions. She will likely never be found guilty of anything. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Renira, a believer
elements.description: Renira continues to pursue her appetites discreetly, although her ambitions have grown.

elements.label: Renira, a disciple
elements.description: Renira commands admiration wherever she goes. She reserves her attentions  for those who merit admiration in return.

elements.label: Renira, a Cyprian
elements.description: Renira receives tokens from admirers almost daily. Some gifts are flowers, others poetry. Sometimes she receives jewels; sometimes, desperate gifts wrapped tightly in blood-stained crepe paper.

elements.label: Rose, an acquaintance
elements.description: Rose is a sly miss, and she recognises you as someone uncommon. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Rose, a believer
elements.description: Rose is a sly miss, but loyal.

elements.label: Rose, a disciple
elements.description: Rose has sharpened her cunning to a concentrated point.

elements.label: Rose, an Assassin
elements.description: The night before Rose meets her subject, the subject will receive a package with a single yellow rose.

elements.label: Saliba, an acquaintance
elements.description: Saliba is a man of prodigious appetites. He is long past the point where their satisfaction has given him any pleasure; but he has learnt so very much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Saliba, a believer
elements.description: Saliba understands blood. He does not yet understand birth.

elements.label: Saliba, a disciple
elements.description: Saliba's pleasures are taken in a room without windows. His companions return to him again and again, even though each time they are a little less.

elements.label: Saliba, a Cyprian
elements.description: Saliba's charisma strikes with the force of a hammer. It is horribly difficult to refuse his desires.

elements.label: Slee, an acquaintance
elements.description: Craig Slee, the astronomer and avant-garde poet, has developed an interest in the esoteric as his health wanes. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Slee, a believer
elements.description: Slee speaks earnestly of his theories to all who will listen: the stars as tiny wounds, and the Sun as a haemorrhage of glory. His poetry is more eccentric than ever.

elements.label: Slee, a disciple
elements.description: Slee's headaches have become crippling, but his theories grow more practical by the day. His poetry's getting better, too.

elements.label: Slee, a Seer
elements.description: Slee speaks exclusively in mathematics and in poetry. Both are compelling: it is increasingly difficult to tell the difference.

elements.label: Spencer, a disciple
elements.description: Spencer carries a tiny icon of St Agnes on a chain around his neck, to rest on the scar above his heart.

elements.label: Spencer, a Herald
elements.description: Some follow the Way, and some are the Way for others. Spencer no longer tells us he made a decision: instead, he suggests that the decision has made him.

elements.label: Sylvia, an acquaintance
elements.description: Sylvia lost her eye in the woods when she was nine years old. Every year, at Candlemas, she returns to the place she buried it. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Sylvia, a believer
elements.description: Sylvia has a detailed knowledge of roof-ridges, of the river at low tide, of Irish whiskey, and of conjuring tricks.

elements.label: Sylvia, a disciple
elements.description: Sylvia's favourite tactic is to smile and close her eye. It is remarkable how often her interlocutor will blurt out exactly what they are thinking.

elements.label: Sylvia, a Skintwister
elements.description: Sylvia has learnt to get out of a place almost before she has gotten in. Sometimes, she leaves dead leaves beneath the window-sill. Sometimes, she writes her name where it won't be found.

elements.label: Tristan, an acquaintance
elements.description: Tristan dislikes distractions. Tristan gets things done. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Tristan, a believer
elements.description: Tristan dislikes distractions; Tristan likes results.

elements.label: Tristan, a disciple
elements.description: Tristan will do what is necessary. To create, sometimes one must first destroy.

elements.label: Tristan, a Reshaper
elements.description: In another age, Tristan might have been a smith. In another life, he might have been a bomb-maker.

elements.label: Valciane, an acquaintance
elements.description: Valciane has operated her establishment for almost twenty years. She has never employed an assistant. Her hands are terribly strong. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Valciane, a believer
elements.description: Valciane's ingenuities are endless, and her grip is stronger than a blacksmith's.

elements.label: Valciane, a disciple
elements.description: Valciane is not a machine. We are reasonably confident of that, because she has been observed, now and then, to commit quite human errors.

elements.label: Valciane, a Reshaper
elements.description: Valciane has begun to work without tools. 'They get in the way,' she claims.

elements.label: Victor, an acquaintance
elements.description: Victor is a sly fellow, and he knows an unusual opportunity when he sees it. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Victor, a believer
elements.description: Victor is a sly fellow, but loyal.

elements.label: Victor, a disciple
elements.description: Victor has sharpened his cunning to a concentrated point.

elements.label: Victor, an Assassin
elements.description: Victor likes to become acquainted with his subjects, so he can apologise to them personally, just before the end.

elements.label: Violet, an acquaintance
elements.description: Violet has always given unstintingly of her time, easing the pain of the dying. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Violet, a believer
elements.description: Violet likes to paint. She has a gift, although she's always been very modest about it. She never puts human figures in her paintings. There are enough people in the world.

elements.label: Violet, a disciple
elements.description: Violet is always very careful.

elements.label: A kindly-faced woman, who is silent
elements.description: Sleep, now. Don't worry about a thing.

elements.label: Ysabet, an acquaintance
elements.description: Ysabet has always been most comfortable by moonlight. She has excellent night vision. She is often overlooked in daylight.[You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Ysabet, a believer
elements.description: Ysabet sleeps in fits and starts. She rises at dusk to do the things an Ysabet does.

elements.label: Ysabet, a disciple
elements.description: Ysabet was just here, just a moment ago. Just here. Almost certainly.

elements.label: Ysabet, a Skintwister
elements.description: Ysabet never lies, now. She doesn't need to.

elements.label: Zachary, a disciple
elements.description: Zachary's reasoning is as certain as ever, but now, it is chillier.

elements.label: Zachary, a Conclusion
elements.description: Zachary has chosen his ending.

elements.label: Auclair, a prisoner
elements.description: Auclair does not speak or eat.

elements.label: Cat Caro, a prisoner
elements.description: The woman who used to call herself 'Cat Caro' sleeps whenever she can.

elements.label: 'Pope' Clifton, a prisoner
elements.description: Clifton roars and curses, but the bars hold, and the walls are thick.

elements.label: Clovette, a prisoner
elements.description: Clovette is waiting for things to turn around.

elements.label: Dorothy, a prisoner
elements.description: Dorothy's constant expostulations wear on the nerves.

elements.label: Douglas, a prisoner
elements.description: Douglas shakes his head sadly. 'Never thought I'd end on the wrong side of the bars. Should have listened to me old mum.'

elements.label: Enid, a prisoner
elements.description: Enid doesn't speak any more.

elements.label: Elridge, a prisoner
elements.description: Elridge is not permitted a spoon, or a plate. It is probably unwise to permit him even the sharper vegetables.

elements.label: Laidlaw, a prisoner
elements.description: Laidlaw's door is bolted, not locked. We know better than that.

elements.label: Leo, a prisoner
elements.description: Leo doesn't understand what he did wrong.

elements.label: Neville, a prisoner
elements.description: Neville is weeping.

elements.label: Porter, a prisoner
elements.description: Porter waits, still as a lizard.

elements.label: Renira, a prisoner
elements.description: Renira always finds ways to pass the time.

elements.label: Rose, a prisoner
elements.description: Rose has not given up. I suspect her of hiding cutlery.

elements.label: Slee, a prisoner
elements.description: Slee writes poetry on the walls, obsessively. If we don't provide ink, he uses what he can.

elements.label: Tristan, a prisoner
elements.description: Tristan will make the best of his situation.

elements.label: Saliba, a prisoner
elements.description: Saliba's anger burns like buried lava.

elements.label: Sylvia, a prisoner
elements.description: We check on Sylvia every hour, just in case.

elements.label: Valciane, a prisoner
elements.description: It is very important never to get within arm's reach of Valciane.

elements.label: Victor, a prisoner
elements.description: Victor's eyes are wells of rage.

elements.label: Violet, a prisoner
elements.description: Violet insists that she's fine. She's fine.

elements.label: Ysabet, a prisoner
elements.description: If Ysabet is weeping, she does so with dry eyes.

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]
elements.comments: legacy element to keep saves valid

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Hanger-On
elements.description: Usefully malleable, but they'll probably never amount to much. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.
elements.comments: This is a legacy element to support older saves.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Pawn
elements.description: This one is loyal, but lacks initiative.

elements.label: A Sturdy Disciple
elements.description: Loyalty, and muscles.

elements.label: A Practical Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, and good with their hands.

elements.label: An Avid Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, but greedy.

elements.label: A Lively Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, and always ready with a song.

elements.label: A Dextrous Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, and clever with locks.

elements.label: A Percipient Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, and keen-sighted.

elements.label: An Erratic Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, if peculiar; peculiar even for one of our kind.

elements.label: A Silent Disciple
elements.description: Loyal, and quiet as falling snow.

elements.label: A Follower Betrayed
elements.description: This one rails weakly against their fate.
